name: Figma
title: figma.com
shortDescription: Figma is a versatile interface design tool that enables users to create, prototype, and collaborate on digital projects in real-time. It's designed for designers, developers, and project teams to streamline the design process and enhance productivity. Example use cases include web design, app development, and creating interactive presentations.
cons: Requires internet connection for full functionality
